About Us

Welcome to our site. We're glad you found us!

We started working together just a short 4 months ago, but you would never expect that with the amount of work we've found ourselves in that short time! We found that we work well as a team because of our distinct skill sets and the cohesive results that happen when applied together. Sarah has the strong technical background in building websites and Adam has an uncanny ability to fill the blank spaces with words so the websites don't look empty.

Feel free to reach out to us any time your project needs via the "Get a Quote!" button below. We would love to help with you create your next project!

Our Team

Sarah Schlueter

Scrum Master

Student at NTC and freelance web developer, specializing in eCommerce websites. Favorite frameworks/libraries include Bootstrap, Ruby on Rails & jQuery.

smschlueter@students.ntc.edu

Adam Domka

Product Manager

Student at NTC in the Software Development program. Past experience includes additive manufacturing, video production and motion design.
